1649.html:
Dear Esteemed Client,

 

Greetings from IMImobile !! Thanks for choosing us your Preferred SMS/Mobility Vendor. 

 

We can certainly provide you transactional route where you can send messages to any number in India with your sender id but first you have to share all sms Templates in below highlighted format.

 

For Transactional route Guidelines: You need to share your all Messaging Templates file in .doc format first before fulfilling the attached docs, if this approved then you can fulfill attached docs further for sign up Transactional route a/c. Templates details for your reference: 

  ‘Hi, the onetime verification code for <XXXX> is <XXXX>. Please enter this to verify you phone number in <XXXX>.’

Note

            XXXX will be consider as a variable Data.

            Space also matter in templates creation and you can send only approved sms to your members.

Service Usage Notice: Using Transactional account you are not authorized to send any type of greetings, Promotions, Wishes, Discounts, Offers or Marketing/Bulk campaign related messages, for this we suggest to send sms using Promotional route account where documents also not needed and you also safe from all legal part as sms will not delivered in DND No’s.

 

 

How to fill attached forms: 

•          DND Category Registration form Guidelines: Find the attached DND category registration form, Print out the registration form and fill all the details mentioned in registration form (Seal and sign required in every pages)

•          Letter of consent (Airtel) Guidelines: Please print the attached form on your company letter head & replace red box or highlighted value where ever require with your company name/Date etc (Seal and sign required in mentioned pages)

•          Undertaking of indemnity for TRAI Compliance guidelines: kindly print the undertaking form on Rs.100/- stamp paper and fill necessary information where ever require. (Seal and sign required in every pages)

•          Once we receive all above documents we will take approval from internal heads and convert the account for sending SMS on transactional route even for instant activation we can approve you’re a/c on softcopy behalf also and after you can courier it on below mention address.

(Monday-Friday B/w 10 AM to 6 PM / 1 working day may be take for activation)

 

Courier Address:

IMImobile Pvt. Ltd.

Plot No. 770, Road No. 44,
Jubilee Hills,
Hyderabad - 500 033,
Telangana - India
M: +91 97991 35786

Note: Kindly share DOCAT Number after courier. If we not received all docs within 7 days of activation than account will be temporary block until receiving the docs.

 

 A few of our renowned customers are Tata Sky, Yahoo, Axis Bank, Google, The Hindu, Ford, Mahindra, ICICI Prudential, Beetel, Allahabad Bank, Inkfruit.com, Nissan Motors, etc. Please feel free to get in touch with us. We look forward to a long term relationship with your organization.Let me know your feedback & interest on the same. Thanking you.

 

----------------------------

Best Regards;

 

Rahul Kumar Jain  

Manager, Enterprise Mobility Sales

       

IMImobile Plot. No.770, Road.No.44, Jubilee Hills, Hyderabad, Telangana – 500 033

M +91 8104897860| 09799135786

Miss call us +91 40 710 11786 

Customer Support - +91-40-30858601 | support@mVaayoo.com

Technical Support 24x7 - +91-40-30858601 | support@mvaayoo.com

1650.html:
Hi Sark.

Is it possible on the date picker to 'grey out' the dyas and months that have passed so the user can't select dates in the past?

Many thanks

Neil.



From: ngf678@hotmail.com
To: sark@sarkware.com
Subject: RE: Date picker
Date: Tue, 16 Jun 2015 09:40:48 +0000

Ok cool will do!

Neil.



Date: Tue, 16 Jun 2015 15:04:38 +0530
From: sark@sarkware.com
To: ngf678@hotmail.com
Subject: Re: Date picker

You are welcome.

If it helped please rate & review in wordpress plugin page.


regards
Sark



On Tuesday 16 June 2015 02:24 PM, Neil Ferguson wrote:
Sark, ignore me, I have got it working thanks so much again!

Neil.


From: ngf678@hotmail.com
To: sark@sarkware.com
Subject: RE: Date picker
Date: Tue, 16 Jun 2015 08:16:03 +0000

Hi Sark. thanks for all your help.

I have followed your instruction but get an error message as follows:

---------

classes/fields/datepicker.php) [function.include-once]: failed to open stream: No such file or directory in /var/sites/s/snapdragonedinburgh.com/public_html/wp-content/plugins/wc-fields-factory/wccpf.php on line 126

Warning: include_once() [function.include]: Failed opening 'classes/fields/datepicker.php' for inclusion (include_path='.:/usr/local/lib/php') in /var/sites/s/snapdragonedinburgh.com/public_html/wp-content/plugins/wc-fields-factory/wccpf.php on line 126

Warning: Cannot modify header information - headers already sent by (output started at /var/sites/s/snapdragonedinburgh.com/public_html/wp-content/plugins/wc-fields-factory/wccpf.php:126) in /var/sites/s/snapdragonedinburgh.com/public_html/wp-content/plugins/wpclef/includes/lib/wp-session/class-wp-session.php on line 124




Date: Tue, 16 Jun 2015 03:20:09 +0530
From: sark@sarkware.com
To: ngf678@hotmail.com
Subject: Re: Date picker

Unfortunately you can't do that from wp-admin screen.


1. download a fresh version of wc-fields-factory from here
2. In your file browser, extract it and there you can find wc-fields-factory/classes/fields/datepicker.php
3. replace it with the updated one ( which i sent you earlier ) and compress the wc-fields-factory as 'zip'
4. visit your wp-admin and go to plugin section
5. deactivate & remove wc-fields-factory
6. upload the updated wc-fields-factory from your pc to your site. and activate it.




On Tuesday 16 June 2015 03:09 AM, Neil Ferguson wrote:
Hi Sark.

I am sorry I am not experienced with code, where do I find: WP_PLUGIN/wc-fields-factory/classes/fields/datepicker.php is it on the attached page?

Also how to upload the .php file?

Any help is greatly appreciated!

Thanks

Neil.







Date: Mon, 15 Jun 2015 13:44:01 +0530
From: sark@sarkware.com
To: ngf678@hotmail.com
Subject: Re: Date picker

Hi Neil,

That's seems to be good option I will try to include that option ( disabling any days ) but that going to take some time. but for now quick solution I have attached datepicker.php, which you have to replace it with your existing one, which is located at WP_PLUGIN/wc-fields-factory/classes/fields/datepicker.php


I have modified the datepicker init script to disable sundays.

I will let you know once I notify this option within the plugin itself.


Regards
Sark



On Monday 15 June 2015 01:30 PM, Neil Ferguson wrote:
HI Saravana?

I have installed your plugin WC Fields Factory. I wondered if there was any way to set the date picker so it does not select Sundays?

Thanks,

Neil.

1661.plain:
Hello!

We'd like to inform you that we're performing a planned software upgrade on the hypervisor that your droplet resides on. 

Expected impact:

In the course of this upgrade, please be advised that your droplet will lose network connectivity for 2-5 minutes as part of the maintenance.   Your droplet will remain powered on during this period -- only network connectivity will be lost.  As always, we will do our absolute best to minimize this downtime.

Below is the scheduled window for this maintenance:

Maintenance start: 2015-09-09 18:00 UTC
Maintenance end:  2015-09-09 20:00 UTC

Thank you,
DigitalOcean

Affected Droplets:
oneeyedreams

Saravana Kumar – help protect yourself.
View online
Help protect yourself.
Online payments still carry elements of risk, even though precautionary measures are taken with buying and selling these days. Learn how to stay safer online and spot phishing immediately, where the most common threats are, why they happen and how they could be prevented.
Learn more about staying safer online
Watch out for phishing.
Online hoaxes are getting more sophisticated – making it tough to know whether an email, SMS or website is real. It’s important you learn how to spot the fakes so you stay safer online.

More about suspicious websites and emails
Report fake emails or spoof websites
If you believe you've received a phishing email, or you’ve came across a spoof PayPal website, do not respond by clicking on any links or opening any attachment. Simply forward the entire email or URL to spoof@paypal.com.
My accountForgot passwordHelpContact us
How do I know this is not a Spoof email? Spoof or “phishing” emails tend to have generic greetings such as "Dear PayPal member". Emails from PayPal will always address you by your given name and family name. More on phishing
Please do not reply to this email. Unfortunately, we are unable to respond to inquiries sent to this address. For immediate answers to your questions, simply visit our Help Center by clicking “Help” at the bottom of any PayPal page.

1693.plain:
Your new Droplet is all set to go! You can access it using the following credentials:

Droplet Name: mail.sarkware.com
IP Address: 128.199.204.138
Username: root
Password: ed572f5df1925b59

For security reasons, you will be required to change this Droplet’s root password when you login. You should choose a strong password that will be easy for you to remember, but hard for a computer to guess. You might try creating an alpha-numerical phrase from a memorable sentence (e.g. “I won my first spelling bee at age 7,” might become “Iwm#1sbaa7”). Random strings of common words, such as “Mousetrap Sandwich Hospital Anecdote,” tend to work well, too.

As an added security measure, we also strongly recommend adding an SSH key to your account. You can do that here: https://cloud.digitalocean.com/ssh_keys

Once added, you can select your SSH key and use it when creating future Droplets. This eliminates the need for root passwords altogether, and makes your Droplets much less vulnerable to attack.

Happy Coding,
Team DigitalOcean

1703.html:
We received a request to reset the password associated with this e-mail address. If you made this request, please follow the instructions below.

Click on the link below to reset your password using our secure server:

https://www.amazon.in/ap/forgotpassword?ie=UTF8&arb=612c8aff-815a-49de-a3a0-8ebb6ce994b8

If you did not request to have your password reset you can safely ignore this email. Rest assured your customer account is safe.

If clicking the link does not seem to work, you can copy and paste the link into your browser's address window, or retype it there. Once you have returned to Amazon, we will give instructions for resetting your password.

Amazon will never e-mail you and ask you to disclose or verify your Amazon password, credit card, or banking account number. If you receive a suspicious e-mail with a link to update your account information, do not click on the link--instead, report the e-mail to Amazon for investigation. Greetings from Amazon.in

1708.html:
Dear Customer,

Your message to mycholan_12@kindle.com, sent at 12:40 AM on Wed, Sep 09, 2015 IST did not include any attached documents or image files.

The Kindle Personal Document Service can convert and deliver the following types of documents:
Microsoft Word (.doc, .docx)
Rich Text Format (.rtf)
HTML (.htm, .html)
Text (.txt) documents
Archived documents (zip , x-zip) and compressed archived documents
Mobi book

Images that are of type JPEGs (.jpg), GIFs (.gif), Bitmaps (.bmp), and PNG images (.png).
Adobe PDF (.pdf) documents are delivered without conversion to Kindle DX, Second Generation and Latest Generation Kindles.

Conversion of Adobe PDF (.pdf) to Kindle format is done on experimental basis.

If the document(s) that failed belonged to one of the above document types, please ensure the document is not password protected or encrypted. Note that the Latest Generation Kindles support password protected PDFs.

You can learn more about transferring personal documents to your Kindle in our help pages:
http://www.amazon.in/kindlepersonaldocuments/

If you would like further assistance, please contact customer support at 40-08170100.

Sincerely,
Amazon Kindle Support

Please Note: This e-mail was sent from a notification-only address that cannot accept incoming e-mail. Please do not reply to this message.

Learn more about Amazon Kindle
Check out the Kindle Store

If you have further questions about Kindle, please visit the Amazon Kindle Help pages
The Help pages will provide you with answers to common questions and provide you with a direct link to Amazon Kindle specialists.
To contact Amazon Kindle Customer Service, simply click a button in the Contact Us box on the Help pages to receive assistance by e-mail or phone.

Hi Saravana, sorry for my english...

I'm using your plugin "WC Product Bundles" and it is great, but I have a problem.
It does not allow the management the bundle's stock when the products included are supplied.
The tab "Inventory" in the "Bundle" product does not exist and so is impossible update it.
Is there a way to fix this?

Thank you!

1716.html:
Hi Sark,

Well, I will continue to use your plugin and I will wait for the new release because I really like your plugin.
I've tried other plugins and one of them "Yith WooCommerce Product Bundles" (you know it?), it manages inventory, but does not have features such as your ... your is always the best! :-)

Thanks again ;)
Cri

2015-09-09 16:52 GMT+02:00 Sarkware <sark@sarkware.com>:
Hi,

Unfortunately woocommerce 'Inventory' option available only for 'simple' & 'variable' products. it won't support 'Bundle' product type.

However I am including Inventory support for 'Bundle' product type, on my next release, it's not yet ready ( as some other improvements are also in the progress )

Will let you know once I released.



Regards
Sark

He is planning to do lot of interesting things with the children, using different type of colors, methods & activities. 
Apart from this, we have various other activities like phonetics, yoga (for children & mothers both), dance & recently we have started Theater classes with renowned story teller Sheetal.
Please call us for detailed enquiry.
Monika.

Hi,

We just tried your plugin wc product bundles. It works Great, fantastic job!!

I have a few requests that I changed for a client.
The bundled products get <h1>-tags for the product title, regarding to SEO-rules you are only allowed to have one <h1>-tag per page or else google will be a little confused so to speak :-) Is it possible for you to change the tags to <h2>-tags or <h3/>-tags on the bundle product titles?

Thanks!


Med vänliga hälsningar

(I tried to send the below at your website, but I'm not sure that it went through.)

Hi, 

I am trying to use your WC Product Bundles plugin, Version 1.0.7, and I keep getting the below error:

Fatal error: Call to undefined function wc_setup_product_data() in /home/wp_8dwbmb/fsplf.dreamhosters.com/wp-content/plugins/wc-product-bundles/classes/dao.php on line 84.  

The WooCommerce version I am using is Version 2.2.6, WP Version 4.3.1.  

Any help with solving this would be greatly appreciated.

Regards,
Emmett Harris

1777.html:
Thanks!


Sent from my Verizon 4G LTE Smartphone


------ Original message------

From: Sarkware

Date: Sat, Sep 19, 2015 10:20 PM

To: Emmett Harris;

Subject:Fwd: Re: WC Product Bundles plugin


Hi,

Just wanted to update, I tested with 2.2.6 and I too got the same error ( it appear Woo 2.2 versions ), though its working fine on 2.3 and 2.4 series.

I will try to fix this issue. In the mean time you can update your woocommerce to 2.3 or 2.4 series.


Regards
Sark


-------------------------

Hi,

What that error means Woocommerce is not found ( or some other issue ). Please check whether woocommerce is Active and working properly.

If nothing helped, Please try to update you Wooocmmerce plugin to latest version ( 2.4.6 ), that should solve the issue.

Let me know any issues.


Regards
Sark

1914.plain:
There has been a response to your ticket:

Hello,

To help us troubleshoot this issue, we ask you to please reply with links to screenshots of the output of the following commands on the impacted droplet.  You will want to gather this information while logged in via the console available in the control panel: 

Please do not attach screenshots to an e-mail, as we cannot receive those to our ticketing system!

iptables -L
iptables -t nat -L
ip addr show
ls -lah /lib/modules
uname -a

Thanks!
DigitalOcean Support

---
Please log-in to your DigitalOcean Control Panel to view your reply: https://cloud.digitalocean.com/support/761772

1915.plain:
There has been a response to your ticket:

Hello!

We have managed to restore your droplet with  a manual reset of your kernel.  Please poweroff the droplet and boot it again to have networking restored (note a reboot will not work here).

To prevent similar issues in the future, we recommend adding the following line to the [main] section of the /etc/yum.conf file:

exclude=kernel*

If there already is an exclude line, add "kernel*" after a space like this:

exclude=somethingexisting* kernel*

Let us know if there is anything else we can assist you with.

Regards,
DigitalOcean Support


---
Please log-in to your DigitalOcean Control Panel to view your reply: https://cloud.digitalocean.com/support/761772

1948.html:
Hi Saravanan,

Below are the background of the requirement:

We have purchased the below THEME and gone LIVE with new store.
http://ella-demo-3.myshopify.com/

Store URL: http://www.dfynorm.com/

Requirement is: 
Need to show the VAT prices inclusive / Exclusive based on the Country.
Basically, if someone access the website from UK, product price will be inclusive of TAX.
If it is other country, product price should be exclusive of TAX.

ex: Actual product price: 1000

      For UK, we need to show as inclusive of tax as 1200.
      For non-UK countries, it should be 1000 (exclusive tax)


From Shopify Forum, we have tried the below 2 methods.

> https://docs.shopify.com/manual/configuration/store-customization/page-specific/product-page/show-vat-price#main

In this method, there is one major limitation of variant. So, we have dropped this.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

> https://ecommerce.shopify.com/c/ecommerce-design/t/adding-vat-to-prices-using-math-filter-36227
 
Can we integrate this method of Math filter option? Please estimate and share the details.

Actually We have tried this method, but we are getting some error after integration. check this url.

oligarcy.myshopify.com
password: oligarcy

After submitting this add to cart, through some error??? not able to fix.

Let me know if you have any queries/clarification on the requriement.

thanks and regards,

senthil

2018.html:
Meet our newest team member, two Liquid tricks, and four upcoming events.

Shopify for Designers #022

As we near the end of September, we're easing ourselves into the final few months of 2015. Here in the UK, that means I can start to feel the nip of autumn creeping in. Cue collective groans from my Canadian colleagues who really know what cold feels like.

We have a packed issue for you this month including saying hello to our newest team member, two Liquid tricks that you might not be aware of, and a list of our upcoming events.

Welcome Levin



I'm very pleased to welcome Levin Mejia to our team. You might have already come across Levin’s work, his apps, or even perhaps attended the conference he ran single-handedly. You’ll be hearing a lot more from him very soon — in fact you can read his first blog post on icons right now.

Showing Taxes in themes
One question that often crops up in my theme building workshops is in relation to taxes — in particular how to display them in a theme. Thankfully, Liquid comes to our rescue again. By using the times function, we are able to display a price with, and without, tax applied. Here’s a quick example that you could use in product.liquid.

{{ product.price | times: 1.15 }}

If the price was £200 the output in this example would be £230.

There are caveats to this technique that you need to be aware of. Thankfully, there’s a full explanation in the Shopify Docs that highlights how to implement it fully using the Minimal theme as an example.

Alternate templates using “view”
I am sure many of you are aware how easy it is to create alternate templates in a Shopify theme. There may be times, however, when you wish to give the site visitor, rather than the store owner, the power to change a layout. A great example of this is when switching from a product grid view to a product list view.

I’ve seen a number of stores over the years use JavaScript to achieve this, but did you know that it’s possible to do the same thing using the URL and the view parameter? Here’s an example using the Supply theme demo from the theme store:

http://supply-electronics.myshopify.com/collections/computers

This URL will by default load the collection.liquid template, or a variation of it if chosen from the admin. However, by adding in the view parameter, Shopify will search for and load the template named collection.list.liquid.

Here’s what it would look like:

http://supply-electronics.myshopify.com/collections/computers?view=list:

If we change the argument from list to grid (e.g. ?view=grid) the collection.grid.liquid template will be loaded. This is a really useful technique and works for all templates in a theme. Just remember which templates are loaded by default and create a new template based on it and you are good to go.

Upcoming events
We’re back on the road in the next few weeks. If you are attending any of the following events, please do come say hello and pick up a paper copy of our Grow book and, if you are lucky, one of our limited edition tin mugs.

  • Rebase — Dublin, Ireland
  • SoDA — Brooklyn, USA
  • Future of Web Design — San Francisco, USA
  • Beyond Tellerrand —Berlin, Germany

Unsubscribe  |  View this email on the web  |  www.shopify.com/partners

Shopify  |  150 Elgin Street, Ottawa ON, K2P 1L4
